script.source: String m; if ( doc.containsKey('answer_geo.asn') && doc.containsKey('answer_geo.as_org.keyword') ) { m = ('ASN' + doc['answer_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['answer_geo.as_org.keyword'].value); emit(m) }

String m; if ( doc.containsKey('destination_geo.asn') && doc.containsKey('destination_geo.as_org.keyword') ) { m = ('ASN' + doc['destination_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['destination_geo.as_org.keyword'].value); emit(m) }

String m; if ( doc.containsKey('source_geo.asn') && doc.containsKey('source_geo.as_org.keyword') ) { m = ('ASN' + doc['source_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['source_geo.as_org.keyword'].value); emit(m) }
